name: AngelBlock
intro: Non-custodial, protocol based fundraising for crypto
introduce: AngelBlock is a decentralized, non-custodial protocol that enables fundraising in a more transparent, decentralized, and democratized manner. When a project lists on AngelBlock with a fundraising goal, all the money they’ll be getting is locked in a smart contract, and from there, the rules apply to both investors and startups. The projects can get the funds based on a milestone-based model where they commit to delivering certain parts of the project or a time-based model.
